To attach picture, just register a free account at www.Imgur.com post your picture there, and paste the link here.

To attach a lot of pictures, just use the Albums at Imgur with the code [imgur*]xxx[/imgur*] <---xxx is your Albums code. remove the *.

To attach file, just register a free account at www., post your file there, and paste the link here.

no lift- lift is in front of CoG and i have 2.04 TWR, i have experimented with the wings endlessly to no avail.

Are you saying you're not getting off the ground even with 2.04 TWR and CoL ahead of COM? In that case, your problem is probably insufficient pitch authority to rotate the nose up. One thing to remember is that IIRC the creation of lift requires there to be some angle of attack between wing and direction of travel so a wing that's perfectly horizontal generations zero lift. There are several ways to fix this:

1. Move the landing gear so the thing sits slightly nose-up. As it moves down the runway, it's got some AoA and thus some lift.

2. Add some canards to the nose to help kick the nose up.

3. Move the rear wheels until they're just barely behind the CoM, so the plane can rotate almost about its CoM instead of having to lever it up on main gear set too far aft.

"sabre m engine"-engines are not attaching to hardpoints

IIRC, SABREs only attach as stacks, not radially.
